casebody.data:
Mary Ann HEGADORN, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES DIRECTOR, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 156132
COA: 329508 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion to substitute "RALPH HEGADORN, as Personal Representative of the Estate of MARY HEGADORN" as the plaintiff-appellant in all further proceedings before this Court is GRANTED.
